data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Torino with the kick-off.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Simone Zaza (Torino) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Bologna's Musa Juwara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 4, Torino have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Torino.
Bologna are coming forward and Mattias Svanberg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Antonio Di Martino awards Torino a goal kick.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Bologna are pushing forward but Danilo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 8, Bologna's Mattias Svanberg breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Andrea Belotti for Torino is whistled offside.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 11, Simone Verdi for Torino drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 13, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Bologna capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 15, In Bologna Bologna drive forward through Musa Barrow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 17, In Bologna, Ibrahima Mbaye of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Mattias Svanberg scores to make it 1-0 at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 18, Roberto Soriano with an assist there.
Free kick Torino.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 23, Bologna's Mattias Svanberg gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Musa Barrow of Bologna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Torino.
Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 25, Free kick Bologna.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
Antonio Di Martino signals a Bologna throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 30, Antonio Di Martino signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Bologna's area.
Torino have a goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino waits before resuming play because Armando Izzo for Torino is still down.
In the minute 33, Torino's Armando Izzo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Torino's Simone Verdi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Torinoâ€™s Andrea Belotti is on his feet again at Renato Dall'Ara.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bologna to check on Andrea Belotti, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 36, Torino drives forward and Simone Verdi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bologna Bologna attack through Musa Barrow. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 37, Antonio Di Martino awards Torino a goal kick.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Bologna.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
In the minute 39, Andrea Belotti for Torino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Torino drive upfield and Andrea Belotti gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Torino's Simone Zaza is whistled for offside at Renato Dall'Ara.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Bologna are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Musa Barrow gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
Tomas Rincon (Torino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Musa Barrow of Bologna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Torino to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Antonio Di Martino blows to end the first-half.
Cristian Ansaldi (Torino) gets a yellow card.
The second half is underway in Bologna - Bologna with the kick-off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Federico Santander is on a sub for Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna.
Bologna make their second substitution with Nicola Sansone replacing Musa Barrow.
In the minute 47, Torino needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Antonio Di Martino awards Torino a goal kick.
Bologna's Musa Juwara gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
Simone Zaza gets his shot on target but fails to score for Torino.
The away team replace Cristian Ansaldi with Ola Aina.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 53, Antonio Di Martino awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicola Sansone (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 56, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Bologna.
Tomas Rincon for Torino has been booked by Antonio Di Martino and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 57, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Free kick Bologna.
Alex Berenguer (Torino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 62, Torino have a goal kick.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 64, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino just outside Bologna's area.
Torino push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Simone Verdi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
Antonio Di Martino signals a Torino throw-in in Bologna's half.
In the minute 66, Torino pushes forward through Alex Berenguer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Simone Zaza gets an equalizer for Torino. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 66, That's a fine assist from Simone Verdi.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Torino.
In the minute 70, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Dominguez is replacing Jerdy Schouten for the home team.
In the minute 72, Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a fourth substitution, with Andri Fannar Baldursson replacing Mattias Svanberg.
Bologna's Federico Santander breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
In the minute 73, In Bologna Torino's Simone Zaza is caught offside.
Andri Fannar Baldursson (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Antonio Di Martino signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Torino's area.
In the minute 75, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Torino!
Federico Santander is booked for the home team.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Armando Izzo with Nicolas N`Koulou. This is the second substitution made today by Moreno Longo.
Andreas Olsen is replacing Musa Juwara for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Torino's Simone Zaza gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, In Bologna Torino drive forward through Simone Zaza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Torino at Renato Dall'Ara.
Torino to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Bologna.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roberto Soriano (Bologna) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Torino's Alex Berenguer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Antonio Di Martino awards Bologna a goal kick.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 82, Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Torino.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Torino.
Gary Medel (Bologna) gets booked by Antonio Di Martino, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 86, Important block from the Bologna defence as Simone Verdi fires in a strike for Torino.
In Bologna Bologna attack through Federico Santander. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 87, Antonio Di Martino awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Andrea Belotti for Torino drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
Federico Santander of Bologna is pulled up for offside.
That's full-time at Renato Dall'Ara. The final score is 1-1.
Christian Celesia is replacing Koffi Djidji for the away team.
